title: Passion's Sacred Dance
description: Unless Stacy Macken can stave off her creditors, she may lose her renowned history center. Yet she knows in her heart that the center is sacred and what a catastrophe losing it would be. How much of a catastrophe, she hasn't a clue.  Until Aaron Fielding arrives with his tales of magical guardians and the Tuatha d√© Danann, sworn warriors from Celtic legend who protect humanity from a wicked enemy seeking their destruction.  Is the end of the world imminent? What can she, a modern woman and her warrior lover, possibly have to offer when a long-prophesied druidic mythic battle explodes around them?  Bonus: Includes brand new flash fiction piece, "About A Warrior"
author: Juli D. Revezzo
